unnormalised: The Ministry of Education launched the PM Poshan Shakti Nirman scheme, extending the midday meal program to include pre-primary children. As per the official notification ref: F.No 1-1/2021-Desk (MDM), the scheme aims to provide one nutritious meal to children in govt. & govt.-aided schools up to class VIII.
normalised: The Ministry of Education launched the P-M Poshan Shakti Nirman scheme, extending the midday meal program to include pre-primary children. As per the official notification reference: F-N-o one hyphen one slash two thousand and twenty one hyphen D-e-s-k (M-D-M), the scheme aims to provide one nutritious meal to children in government and government-aided schools up to class eight.

unnormalised: Under the scheme, children receive benefits like free meals, textbooks, and uniforms. It's estimated that ~11.8 crore children will benefit from this program. Financial outlay stands at â‚¹1.31 lakh crore, shared between the Centre (60%) and State (40%).
normalised: Under the scheme, children receive benefits like free meals, textbooks, and uniforms. It is estimated that approximately eleven point eight crore children will benefit from this program. Financial outlay stands at rupee one point three one lakh crore, shared between the Centre (sixty percent) and State (forty percent).

unnormalised: Officials from the Dept. of Education emphasized the importance of scheme enrollment before 31/07/2024 to avail all benefits. Beneficiaries can register online through the PM Poshan portal using their Aadhaar no. or school ID. For assistance, call the toll-free helpline: 1800-11-2222.
normalised: Officials from the Department of Education emphasized the importance of scheme enrollment before thirty first July two thousand and twenty four to avail all benefits. Beneficiaries can register online through the P-M Poshan portal using their Aadhaar number or school I-D. For assistance, call the toll-free helpline: one eight hundred hyphen eleven hyphen two thousand two hundred and twenty two.
